text: Ibrahim Pasha Mosque, (, ) is a mosque in Bulgaria. ==History== The structure is situated in the city of Razgrad, Ludogorie () region. Currently the mosque is closed for usage and its reconstruction still has not been completed since socialist Bulgarian times. In 2018 Bulgarian officials have allowed restoration of the historical building to be done by the Turkish government. ==See also== * Islam in Bulgaria Category:Ottoman mosques in Bulgaria Category:Razgrad Category:Buildings and structures in Razgrad Province Category:Former mosques in Bulgaria
title: Ibrahim Pasha Mosque
